statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{19 \, x^{3} - 13 \, x^{2} + 9 \, x + 21 , -12 \, x^{3} + 7 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 13 , -2 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 3 , 7 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 8 , -5 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 3 \, x - 5\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
